suggest.meta_keywords: Grafana dashboard, data transferred, Grafana Cloud, Azion API, Real-Time Metrics, GraphQL query, API integration, performance monitoring, dashboard customization, data visualization
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to integrate Real-Time Metrics from Azion API into Grafana to monitor data transferred and customize dashboards effectively.

current.meta_description: You can use the JSON example to create a dashboard on Grafana with the Data Transferred metrics from Real-Time Metrics.
